page.title: 19Leisure and Recreation
page.content: In Sherborne St. John, The Village Hall with the adjacent Village Green, Working Mens Club and the recently extended and refurbished Swan Inn provide the main focus of community and social activities. For the younger residents there is a Playgroup, Brownie and Cub packs and a Guide Company. The Recreation Ground has tennis courts, football and cricket pitches and a childrens playground. There are many walks through the woodlands and footpaths throught the countryside. There is a nine holed golf course at Basingstoke District Hospital. The Hospital has social clubs and some of the industries do too. The Caribbean Club on the Houndsmill Estate caters for the West Indian population of Basingstoke. There are also social clubs on the housing estates.
